features.name: D3 JavaScript Library Registration
features.description: The D3.js v3 library is properly registered in the DNN JavaScript library system and available for use by other modules.
test_scenarios: Verify D3 library appears in JavaScript Libraries list
Verify library version shows as 3.2.8
Verify library friendly name displays as 'D3 JavaScript Library'
Verify library object name is registered as 'd3'
Verify library description is displayed correctly

features.name: D3 Library Loading and Availability
features.description: The D3.js library loads correctly and is available in the global JavaScript scope for modules to use.
features.ui_location: Any page that references the D3 library
test_scenarios: Verify d3 object is available in browser console
Verify d3.version returns '3.2.8'
Test basic D3 functionality (d3.select, d3.scale, d3.svg)
Verify minified version loads correctly in production mode
Verify non-minified version loads in debug mode

features.name: CDN Support and Fallback
features.description: The D3 library can be loaded from CDN with automatic fallback to local files if CDN is unavailable.
features.ui_location: Host > Host Settings > Advanced Settings > CDN Settings
test_scenarios: Enable CDN and verify D3 loads from http://d3js.org/d3.v3.min.js
Simulate CDN failure and verify fallback to local file
Verify CDN path is correctly configured in library settings
Test with CDN disabled - should load local file
Verify proper error handling when both CDN and local fail

features.name: Azure Compatibility
features.description: The D3 library extension is marked as Azure compatible and works correctly in Azure-hosted environments.
features.ui_location: Host > Extensions > JavaScript Libraries > D3 > Package Settings
test_scenarios: Verify azureCompatible flag is set to true
Deploy to Azure environment and verify library loads
Test library functionality in Azure App Service
Verify no Azure-specific errors in console
Confirm library works with Azure CDN if configured

features.name: License Compliance
features.description: The D3 library includes proper MIT license documentation and attribution.
features.ui_location: Host > Extensions > JavaScript Libraries > D3 > View License
test_scenarios: Verify MIT license file is present and readable
Verify license is properly referenced in d3.dnn manifest
Check license appears in extension details
Verify license file gets deployed to Licenses folder
Confirm license attribution in library header comments

features.name: Version Management and Cleanup
features.description: The extension properly manages version upgrades and cleanup of old versions.
features.ui_location: Host > Extensions > JavaScript Libraries > D3 > Package Settings
test_scenarios: Verify version 03.02.08 cleanup component executes
Check old version files are removed during upgrade
Verify release notes are accessible
Test upgrade from older D3 version to current
Verify Resources/Libraries/D3/3.2.8/ path is cleaned up

features.name: Module Integration Support
features.description: Other modules can successfully reference and use the D3 library for data visualization.
features.ui_location: Any custom module that uses D3 for visualization
test_scenarios: Create test module that requests D3 library
Verify D3 functions work in module context
Test D3 SVG creation and manipulation
Verify no conflicts with other JavaScript libraries
Test concurrent usage by multiple modules on same page
